      • getInstance

        public static ElastosWebrtc getInstance()

        get ElastosWebrtc singleton instance

        返回:
        ElastosWebrtc singleton instance

      • initialize

        public void initialize(@NonNull
                       ElastosWebrtcConfig c,
                       @NonNull
                       android.app.Activity activity,
                       @NonNull
                       org.elastos.carrier.Carrier carrier,
                       @NonNull
                       CallHandler callHandler)

        set necessary object

        参数:
        c - ElastosWebrtcConfig config
        activity - Activity activity
        carrier - Carrier elastos carrier
        callHandler - CallHandler CallHandler implementation

      • invite

        public void invite(java.lang.String userId)

        send video call invite to userId, the user must be your friend and online.

        参数:
        userId - elastos userId

      • acceptInvite

        public void acceptInvite()

        to accept someone's video call invite

      • reject

        public void reject()

        reject video call invite

      • onReceiveFriendInvite

        public void onReceiveFriendInvite(java.lang.String from,
                                  java.lang.String data)

        receive someone's FriendInvite message, this should be called in CarrierHandler.onFriendInviteRequest(Carrier, String, String)

        参数:
        from - message sender
        data - message body

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String userId,
                        SignalMessageType type,
                        java.lang.String sdpType,
                        java.lang.String message,
                        org.elastos.carrier.FriendInviteResponseHandler handler)

        send message to userId

        参数:
        userId - user id
        type - SignalMessageType message type
        sdpType - sdp type: answer or offer
        message - message body
        handler - message send result

      • initVideoRenderer

        public void initVideoRenderer(org.webrtc.SurfaceViewRenderer localRenderer,
                              org.webrtc.SurfaceViewRenderer remoteRenderer)

        set video renderer, this should be called before acceptInvite()

        参数:
        localRenderer - SurfaceViewRenderer local video renderer
        remoteRenderer - SurfaceViewRenderer remote video renderer

      • switchCamera

        public void switchCamera()

        toggle camera to front or back, default with front camera

      • switchRenderer

        switch local and remote video renderer

      • toggleMic

        public boolean toggleMic()

        toggle mic on|off

        返回:
        mic status

      • setSpeaker

        public void setSpeaker(boolean on)

        set speaker on|off

        参数:
        on - true|false

      • setAudioEnabled

        public void setAudioEnabled(boolean enabled)

        set audio enabled

        参数:
